item.config:
{"magicslider_id":"26","title":"The Legendary Outerwear Brand You Need To Know","image-class":"loaded","stores":"0","status":"1","mobile":"1","portrait":"1","landscape":"1","tablet":"1","notebook":"1","laptop":"1","desktop":"1","widescreen":"1","visible":"1","vertical":"false","infinite":"true","autoplay":"true","arrows":"false","dots":"false","adaptive-height":"false","fade":"false","rows":"1","speed":"300","autoplay-Speed":"3000","padding":"0","media_gallery":{"images":{"qg7nnh10hs4":{"position":"2","media_type":"external-video","video_provider":"","file":"/v/i/video.png","value_id":"","label":"","link":"","caption":"","disabled":"0","removed":"","video_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DPopVJX-6Sk","video_title":"Black & White Lookbook - Minimal Mens Outfits | Imdrewscott","video_description":"I have had so many requests to style outfits around the colors black and white. Here are 5 looks showcasing a few minimal and edgy mens ensambles for year round! Which was your favorite?
+ + + CLICK HERE FOR ALL INFO! + + +
• Don't forget to give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed!
• Are you following my blog? - http://bit.ly/1pSA9f3

*** If item is not in stock, an alternate has been linked ***
